an8.12:26.1.pli: “Anuviccakāraṁ kho, sīha, karohi. Anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṁ ñātamanussānaṁ sādhu hotī”ti.
an8.12:26.1.en: “Sīha, you should act after careful consideration. It’s good for well-known people such as yourself to act after careful consideration.”

an8.12:26.2.pli: “Imināpāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato bhiyyoso mattāya attamano abhiraddho, yaṁ maṁ bhagavā evamāha: ‘anuviccakāraṁ kho, sīha, karohi. Anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṁ ñātamanussānaṁ sādhu hotī’ti.
an8.12:26.2.en: “Now I’m even more delighted and satisfied with the Buddha, since he tells me to act after careful consideration.

an8.12:26.5.pli: Atha ca pana bhagavā evamāha: ‘anuviccakāraṁ, sīha, karohi. Anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṁ ñātamanussānaṁ sādhu hotī’ti.
an8.12:26.5.en: And yet the Buddha tells me to act after careful consideration.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 8.12
2. The Great Chapter
With Sīha

mn56:16.1.pli: “Anuviccakāraṁ kho, gahapati, karohi, anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṁ ñātamanussānaṁ sādhu hotī”ti.
mn56:16.1.en: “Householder, you should act after careful consideration. It’s good for well-known people such as yourself to act after careful consideration.”

mn56:16.2.pli: “Imināpāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato bhiyyoso mattāya attamano abhiraddho yaṁ maṁ bhagavā evamāha: ‘anuviccakāraṁ kho, gahapati, karohi, anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṁ ñātamanussānaṁ sādhu hotī’ti.
mn56:16.2.en: “Now I’m even more delighted and satisfied with the Buddha, since he tells me to act after careful consideration.

mn56:16.6.pli: ‘anuviccakāraṁ kho, gahapati, karohi, anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṁ ñātamanussānaṁ sādhu hotī’ti.
mn56:16.6.en: ‘Householder, you should act after careful consideration. It’s good for well-known people such as yourself to act after careful consideration.’
